rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0002
rows.name:
So this is Gula, huh? It's so pretty...
I think the grass really is greener on
the other side!

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0003
rows.name:
It is kind of a dream destination,
isn't it?

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0004
rows.name:
And that's exactly why everyone's
trying to claim it for themselves.
Ruining it for everyone else.

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0005
rows.name:
Still, it's not like there was
anywhere else to turn to...

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0006
rows.name:
This is practically the only place where
Laura-sama's mother could feel secure,
these days..

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0008
rows.name:
If it weren't for you, I'd never have
found out that my mother fled here.
I can't thank you enough for that.

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0010
rows.name:
Come on, let's get to Trigo.
I can't wait to see Mother again!

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0011
rows.name:
OK. Let's just head along the road,
it will take us straight there.

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0012
rows.name:
Just remember, this is uncharted
territory for us. Try not to...

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0013
rows.name:
...Never mind. It's not like I need
to tell any of you that.

rows.label: fev11_170_150_msg0014
rows.name:
Yes, I dare say we've all learned to
exercise caution by this point... Let's
not dally, then. Onwards!
